alb_dns_name.description: Public DNS name of the Application Load Balancer.

az_count.description: Number of AZs to use (2 recommended).

container_image.description: Container image to run. Can be Docker Hub (e.g., nginx:latest) or ECR image URI.

container_port.description: Port exposed by the container and used by the ALB target group.

cpu_target_utilization.description: Target CPU utilization percentage for autoscaling.

enable_execute_command.description: Enable ECS Exec for the service.

health_check_path.description: ALB target group health check path.

max_capacity.description: Maximum number of tasks for autoscaling.

min_capacity.description: Minimum number of tasks for autoscaling.

project_name.description: Project/name prefix used for resource naming.
